str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hate, detest, love less, esteem less. From a primary misos; to detest; by extension, to love less.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hate, detest, love less, esteem less. From a primary misos; to detest; by extension, to love less.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
First, in the first place, before, formerly. Neuter of protos as adverb; firstly.
